overview:
Muhammad Huzaifa is a young entrepreneur who has quickly grown his own successful software applications development business into a successful sustainable venture. Currently Muhammad Huzaifa holds responsibility as CEO of iKnowl. iKnowl is a knowledge sharing and publishing platform for mobiles and tablets.

AWARDS AND RECOGNITIONS:

Received award from PASHA for the best Startup Idea 2010, for startup Tagit (SMS based marketing solution). Judged and selected by Microsoft, TRG , Alchemy technologies, Mixit and Systems limited.

Received award for solution “Advanced use of QR-Code & text messaging for feedback management” from Innocentive Inc USA for Challenge #9654477 - Monitoring the Voice of the Patient Over The Internet

Developed application “Best Music Videos” for Nokia S60 devices which is used by 900,000 Nokia users.
